page.title: 12ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: Our area,{Belle Vue,}is near the town centre and most people use the town's facilities. The cinema, clubs, pubs and in-town entertainment are the most popular. Most people go out either once a week{34%,}or twice a week{26%. The majority,{53%}believe that the entertainment is poor,{27%}think its adequate, and only{20%}think it is very good. After work most folk watch T.V., do housework, relax or cook. {Shrewsbury Flower Show,}one of the best in the country attracts{46%}of people from our area. The{West Midland {Show}does not attract as many locals but appeals more to the rural peole of {Shropshire}being an agricultural show. Only{30%}of those surveyed go to disco's. Few people take advantage of the excellent perfoming arts such as plays and top entertertainment provided at{Shrewsbury School.
